name: office-management
description: This is a system implemented for a office. There are several functions as Employee Management, Client Management, Inventory Management, Document Management. Add Details, Read Details, Update Status, Update Details, Delete Details are main operations for all of the functions. This is the backend of the office management system.
author: Priyanka PDMK - Employee Management | Jayawardana GVHD - Client Management | Dharmadasa KRWS - Inventory Management | Alahakoon ASGP - Document Management
